meanings.definition: One who discovers something jointly with another.
meanings.sent1: The codiscoverer of the new planet was thrilled to share the credit.
meanings.sent2: The two scientists were codiscoverers of the rare fossil.
meanings.sent3: The codiscoverer and his partner high-fived in excitement.
meanings.sent4: Being a codiscoverer felt like unlocking a treasure chest together.
meanings.sent5: The title of codiscoverer brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: To discover something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: They codiscovered the ancient ruins during their expedition.
meanings.sent2: The team codiscovered a new species of flower in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The friends codiscovered the hidden cave while hiking.
meanings.sent4: Codiscovering the lost manuscript felt like solving a mystery together.
meanings.sent5: The group's goal was to codiscover the buried treasure.
